# MTP.Graphics

A package containing helper functions for the devlopment of graphics for the Mother Tree Project (MTP)

## Installation

You can install the development version of MTP.Graphics from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tcharris2/MTP.Graphics")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(MTP.Graphics)
## basic example code
```
